repairedDockerfile:
FROM ruby:2.6.2
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y build-essential libpq-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN curl -f -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_10.x | bash -
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y nodejs && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN curl -f -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add -
RUN echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y yarn && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN mkdir -p /wheel
WORKDIR /wheel
ADD . /wheel
RUN bundle install
CMD /wheel/setup_while_container_init.sh
